cmd.select("sele", "chain N:Z")
cmd.hide("surface", "sele")
cmd.set_view((-0.6933377385139465, 0.16534584760665894, -0.7013854384422302, -0.12228986620903015, 0.9322038292884827, 0.340645432472229, 0.7101596593856812, 0.3219541013240814, -0.626112699508667, 3.471970558166504e-06, -7.900595664978027e-05, -531.5189208984375, 35.61798095703125, 21.159212112426758, 25.909738540649414, 421.2265930175781, 641.8179931640625, -20.0))
